Super Jigsaw - HD Puzzle Games

Unleash your inner puzzler with Super Jigsaw, a delightful HD jigsaw puzzle game designed for adults. With a vast library of over 10,000 free jigsaw puzzles and fresh daily challenges, this app not only entertains but also enhances your brain power by promoting logical thinking and memory skills.

üìå Core Features

  • Extensive Puzzle Library: Browse thousands of stunning HD puzzles across diverse categories, from breathtaking landscapes to charming animals. üñºÔ∏è
  • Daily Challenges: Engage with new puzzles released daily and earn exciting rewards for completing them. üéØ
  • Customizable Difficulty: Tailor your jigsaw experience by adjusting the number of pieces, ranging from easy 36-piece puzzles to challenging 400-piece masterpieces. üß©
  • Intuitive Controls: Enjoy seamless drag-and-drop functionality for an effortless puzzling experience. üì±
  • Helpful Tools: Utilize features such as edge sorting and preview mode to facilitate your puzzle-solving journey. üîß

üëç Pros

  • Free to Play: Access thousands of puzzles without any initial charges. üí∞
  • Regular Updates: Benefit from hundreds of new puzzle games added weekly, ensuring a fresh experience. üìÖ
  • Skill Development: Improve your logical thinking and memory skills through engaging gameplay. üß†

  • Progress Tracking: Monitor your achievements and completion times to challenge yourself further. ‚è±Ô∏è

üëé Cons

  • Subscription Model: While the app offers a free plan, some features may require a subscription for full access. üö´

  • Limited Free Content: While there are thousands of puzzles, some users may find the selection limited without the subscription. üìä

üíµ Price

Super Jigsaw begins with a free plan, but options for subscription upgrades are available. Purchases will be charged to your Apple App Store account, and subscriptions auto-renew unless turned off.
